name: The Fire Keeper (Murphyslaw)
description:
This is my first (somewhat) complete game development project, which I created from idea to this release as part of the Unity Learning Course "Create with Code". It took me about 50 to 60 working hours to complete, while learning Unity from scratch. It was a lot of fun, I learned a lot (mainly learned many things I don"t know yet) and I'm very proud of it.

Credits

Thank you for the following free Unity Asset Store packs. You are awesome!

"FREE Casual Game SFX Pack" by Dustyroom
"Low-Poly Simple Nature Pack" by JustCreate
"Simple Low Poly Nature Pack" by NeutronCat
"Wood Splitting Pack 1" by Shoni Pal
"Action RPG Music Free" by VGcomposer
"Create with Code | Complete Course Library" by Unity Education

Questions, Comments & Feedback

Please feel free to send me any questions, comments or feedback. This would be much appreciated! Thank you!
